Text: If anyone is still having any low fps issues as an alternative you can lower the multisampling to 1 and enable bloom for better lighting with a higher fps.
If anyone is having low fps with multisampling you can lower the multisampling to 1 and enable bloom for better lighting with a higher fps (but more pixelation).

sorry about quadruple post.. the pirate bay has been lagged lately.

if anyone wants a classic windows game ported to mac let me know.
if you want to increase the brightness, hold down the alt key and then double click on it. This will open the wineskin menu. Go to "Set screen options" and change brightness

@freaklips: I highly doubt it, but there's an application called Gamepad Companion that can emulate mouse+keyboard input using a HID device (controller). It costs money, but I'm confident that wouldn't be an issue for you lololol ;D
